title: Everytime I launch league I get the same prompt
body:
Every time I launch LoL I get
> League of Legends will now update your desktop shortcuts. Your operating system may ask for Administrator permissions.

I click OK each time, and then Yes to the Command Prompt permissions. Each time after that, it does it again.

replies.body:
I had the same issue. I have a custom Rainmeter Launcher that would open C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.exe, but it looks like the Client wants you to open the client directly. The popup was trying to change my desktop shortcuts, but since I was using Rainmeter, it couldn't do anything. 

Manually changing the shortcut to open C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe instead fixed it for me

Make sure that you're launching the client as Admin first, since it sounds like it's not getting the right permissions even after requesting rights. Follow the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure League can access the files it needs while running as well.
Also wanted to add, this might actually be trying to update the shortcut you have pinned to your start menu if you do. In this case, unpin the shortcut, let it update, then you can repin the new one.
